Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/boot/lilo

What you'll find here: autoboots from a hard drive w/ menu choice of os

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

lilo-21.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-12-05
Generic boot loader for Linux (169791 bytes)
lilo-colors-1.21.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-04-04
patch to lilo version 20 that enables it to use color for boot messages (14666 bytes)
lilo-disk-by-mountpoint-0.1.patch.gz (LSM entry) 1998-09-29
Patch to lilo-20 to allow disk= stanzas to be specified by mount point (841 bytes)
lilo-t-21.ps.gz 1998-12-05
PostScript technical specs for lilo (51388 bytes)
lilo-u-21.ps.gz 1998-12-05
PostScript manual for lilo (131194 bytes)
